title: Problem with installing C++ 2005 Redistributable (x64) PLS HELP !
body: Just wanted to install LoL then suddenly it throws me to the setup for C++ 2005 Redistributable (x64) and I cannot install that C++ thing. I REALLY want to play this game PLS HELP. I tried googling the problem, installing the C++ manually and none of them work. I am very very sad so please Riot Can you help me? Thanks

replies.body: What exactly is going wrong when you're trying to install the C++ files? You may need to make sure that you're running the install process with admin rights.
